Contact

Max Planck Digital Library
Amalienstraße 33
80799 München
www.mpdl.mpg.de

rdm [at] mpdl [dot] mpg [dot] de

Individual services can be contacted via [service] [at] mpdl [dot] mpg [dot] de.

Roadshows

We are happy to visit your Max Planck institute to present our service portfolio and answer questions on these services, as well as other specific research data management questions. Roadshows can also be held remotely.
